ygData.subject: Neo BeastWars The Ninja
ygData.msgSnippet: As the ship drifts into the timestream it exits through as it heads towards prehistoric earth. It spirals as the ship flies over the maximal base setting off

As the ship drifts into the timestream it exits through as it heads towards 
prehistoric earth. It spirals as the ship flies over the maximal base 
setting off any pred sensors as the crashes right wing breaks off.

::Koj::

Slams the wall destroying the insignia on his chest.

::Computer::
Scanning for beast mode scanner damaged three creatures aquried creatures. 
All datatracks will be lost in process.

::Koj::

Koj looks at himself in mirror his beastmode that of a White Tiger with 2 
horns of a Chameleon. Looking at his Large metallic Hawk wings.  "Where am I 
or better yet who am I?"

::?::

As 2 green eye leer out of the darkness. As Horse sized Sliver Dragon steps 
out of the darkness.

::Koj::

Paralyze with fear can't move.

::?::

As the Dragon Sticks out it forked silver tongue and licks Koj.

::Koj::

"I guess your a Friend?"

::?::

As it shoots a green beam into Koj eyes send pictures.
